Row.Text: The Railway Engineer costs iron to produce, coal to maintain, and is capable of building 10 tiles worth of railroad. Railroads are created as the engineer moves. Requires a Railyard in the city. Railroads will not be constructed if you have 0 Coal in your stockpile, or if the Engineer does not move adjacent to an existing railroad.
The Railyard enables construction of Railway Engineers in the city. +1 [ICON_TradeRoute] Trade Route capacity, if this city does not yet have a Market or Lighthouse building.
